reference_template: [Screen name or Channel name]. (Year, Month Day). *Title of video* [Video]. YouTube. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xxxxx
template_explanation: YouTube videos include the channel name, upload date, video title in italics, format descriptor [Video], platform name, and direct URL.
common_rules: Use channel name or screen name as author
Video title italicized and in sentence case
Use full YouTube URL not shortened links
